channel.title: ERROR : volatility.debug : The requested file doesn't exist
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I'm new with volatility. My question is how to fix this error when I run command: volatility -f test.raw imageinfo
ERROR : volatility.debug : The requested file doesn't exist or even fully path like: volatility -f /tmp/test.raw imageinfo or volatility -f c:\test.raw imageinfo I've tried run volatility on any OS such as windows, linux, mac or even pre-installed version on Kali but I still get this error. And any result from search engine can't help me. Thanks for reading.

item.title: ERROR : volatility.debug : The requested file doesn't exist
item.dc:creator: j3ssiejjj
item.description:
Hi everyone, I’m new with volatility.
My question is how to fix this error when I run command:
volatility -f test.raw imageinfo

ERROR : volatility.debug : The requested file doesn’t exist
or even fully path like: volatility -f /tmp/test.raw imageinfo
or
volatility -f c:\test.raw imageinfo
I’ve tried run volatility on any OS such as windows, linux, mac or
even pre-installed version on Kali but I still get this error. And any result from search engine can’t help me.
Thanks for reading.
